name: Flay
description:
Little but brave Flay traverses the world. Flay flies all around. It is a bright object in the blue skies you can not miss. Is it a bird or a toy? - no one knows. In his great world, the most important is to circumvent unexpected random obstacles and catch the tasty bites. Flay loves pinky bites. Every day travels into the unknown and such fact excites our hero so much.

The end of Flays journey can not be seen. Who knows why Flay follows the endless stream of excitement in his life. Let's flay and check it out! The answer is in the air!
